          <title>
            <string language="en">Fire producing domestic appliances</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feuer, Haushaltsgeräte produzierend</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le feu produisant les appareils domestiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fogo produzindo dispositivos domésticos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fuoco producendo gli apparecchi per uso 
domestico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πυρκαγιά που παράγει τις εσωτερικές συσκευές</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuego produciendo las aplicaciones domésticas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a domestic appliance that uses electric fire and another type which involves burning of fuel (gas fire is used)</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric fire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">fuel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gas fire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">heat</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oxygen</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Haushaltsgerät, das 
Heizsonne und einen anderen Typen benutzt, welches das Brennen des 
Kraftstoffs miteinbezieht (Gasfeuer wird benutzt)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un appareil domestique 
qui utilise un radiateur électrique et un type différent ce qui 
implique la brûlure du carburant (le feu de gaz est utilisé)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um dispositivo 
doméstico que use o fogo elétrico e um outro tipo qual envolve a 
queimadura do combustível (o fogo do gás é usado)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un apparecchio per 
uso domestico che usa il fuoco elettrico e un altro tipo quale 
coinvolge bruciarsi del combustibile (il fuoco del gas è usato)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει εσωτερική συσκευή ότι 
χρήσεις ηλεκτρική πυρκαγιά και ένας άλλος τύπος που 
περιλαμβάνει το κάψιμο των καυσίμων (αέριο η πυρκαγιά 
χρησιμοποιείται)</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una aplicación 
doméstica que utilice la estufa eléctrica y otro tipo cuál implica 
quemarse del combustible (se utiliza el fuego del gas)</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heizsonne</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kraftstoff</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Gasfeuer</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-fr">carburant</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
